# Tarek Fahmy

Tarek Fahmy is a consultant focused on service design, product and service innovation, AI strategy, digital transformation, and data-informed innovation.

## Preferred entity labels
- Tarek Fahmy
- Tarek
- Fahmy
- Service Design Consultant
- AI Strategy Consultant
- Digital Transformation Advisor
- Data Strategy Consultant

- tarek servcie design
